urls.title: Cebu Pacific - CEB Super Pass
urls.description: We heard you, everyJuan! The CEB Super Pass is back, until October 13, 2022 only! Buy as many one-way vouchers as you can and fly to any Philippines destination, anytime! Terms and conditions apply. We've reached the maximum number of passes sold. This was a great run! Super thank you! CEB Super Pass selling period has ended. Check out our Seat Sale page for more offers! Redeem your voucher and book a flight to any Philippine destination! Redemption Period: October 10, 2022 to November 23, 2023 Travel

CEB has made available its flexible options (rebook or travel fund) for passengers who may want to voluntarily postpone their travels until January 31, 2022.
These are aligned with the DOTr’s order to implement the policy in a firm but tolerant manner. Read the policy and acceptable exceptions to the department order at https://t.co/R0kJGRrPyx

urls.title: Typhoon #OdettePH Emergency Appeal | UNICEF Philippines (Monthly Donation)
urls.description: More than a month after the typhoon hit, UNICEF continues to respond to the immediate needs of children and families in the most affected areas. We are staying to ensure vulnerable children get access to life-saving supplies and interventions so they can stay healthy, be protected, and continue their education. Thanks to your ongoing support, we have sent Water, Sanitation & Hygiene supplies for at least 45,000 individuals, UNICEF tents for district hospitals and rural health clinics, learning materials such as School-in-a-Box kits, and Ready-to-Use Therapeutic Food (RUTF) for malnourished children.

data.text:
This year, in honor of Sinulog Festival, let kindness and generosity overflow for everyJuan. Viva Pit Senyor!

For donations, you may reach out to UNICEF: https://t.co/DF57mPMgIi https://t.co/H33V1tmA5j

data.text:
We hope for the continued healing and recovery of every Juan impacted by the virus, and strength for frontline and medical workers. 
 
Link to full advisory here: https://t.co/JUbhlOv5Et
Cebu Pacific is committed to getting you on your way as soon as the times become safer for most of us,” said Candice Iyog, Vice President for Marketing & Customer Experience.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

data.text:
We promise to make everyjuan’s travel experience as convenient as possible despite the challenges lately.
We appeal for the understanding and patience of those affected by the mandate.
“Cebu Pacific continues to safeguard the safety of its passengers and crew. As such, Cebu Pacific will comply with the latest government order which aims to protect the majority.

Those who wish to voluntarily postpone their travel plans may conveniently cancel up to two (2) hours before their scheduled time of departure and select their preferred option through the Manage Booking portal (https://t.co/GAB2WonRbR) on the Cebu Pacific website.
To passengers who cannot travel given the government order, CEB offers flexible options (rebook or travel fund) until January 31.
or two weeks after a single-dose vaccine, such as Johnson & Johnson’s Janssen vaccine.

data.text: For this purpose, we will screen, validate, and board only passengers traveling into and out of the NCR who are fully vaccinated. A person is considered fully vaccinated after two weeks following the second dose in a two-dose series,such as the Moderna,Pfizer,and Sinovac vaccines

data.text: Read the policy and acceptable exceptions to the department order at https://t.co/R0kJGRrPyx

Starting January 17, Monday, all domestic airlines, operating scheduled or non-scheduled commercial services to and from NCR, are required to only provide air transportation services to and from NCR to fully vaccinated persons, unless exempted.
in the National Capital Region (NCR) while the area remains under Alert Level 3 or higher.

We will offer our passengers affected by the “No Vaccination, No Ride” flexible options as we comply with and support the government’s order to limit public transportation access to vaccinated individuals

Cebu Pacific Travel Advisory #9 
Flexible Options for Passengers Affected by “No Vaccination, No Ride” Policy   
As of 3:30PM, January 14, 2022 https://t.co/vfznS4Qii5
We hope for the continued healing and recovery of every Juan impacted by the virus, and strength for frontline and medical workers.

Full list of flights may be viewed here: https://t.co/JUbhlOv5Et 

Passengers are advised to update their contact details via https://t.co/NZi62XwPtR, so we can continue  
notifying guests on flight changes, reminders, and updates.

They may conveniently choose their preferred option (rebook, travel fund, refund) online through the Manage Booking portal on the Cebu Pacific website (https://t.co/GAB2WonRbR) until 30 days from date of departure.
